title: The Patchwork Protocol
outcome: A mysterious protocol embedded by Halden merges fragments of old BCI routines with resident data and histories, causing boundaries between citizen categories and personal narratives to blur. As neighborhood assemblies step up to make sense of confusion and sudden empathy between former adversaries, the Council faces a choice: risk everything to reset the city or accept the emergent, collective-led order. Halden's intent is revealed as a gamble on shared humanity rather than surveillance.

events.description: Unusual BCI responses cause former high-score and low-score residents to share privileges and restrictions unpredictably. Stories and memories mix, confusing identities and boundaries.
Assemblies host citywide listening sessions, sharing experiences and helping citizens navigate identity shifts. Oksana tracks traces of a hidden protocol in Halden's archived code.
Council factions argue over whether to forcibly reset the BCI, risking collective memory loss, or embrace the new social order emerging from grassroots collaboration.
A vote is held: residents and assemblies choose to preserve the patchwork system. Rada broadcasts Halden's hidden message, affirming his faith in collective empathy over algorithmic judgment.
